title: ILY
lyrics:
haluui sijag-i
neolo gadeug chaseo
honja namgyeojyeoss-eul ttaen
gwaenhi bul-anhaejyeo
heulishan nae mam-e deullyeowa
neoui ttatteushan mogsoliga

Baby I’m falling for you

I love you our love is true

(an-ajwo) sigan-i jinado

I love you our love is true

(an-ajwo) nal nohji mal-ajwo

jichin halu kkeut-en

neul neoui misoga

neowa hamkke iss-eul ttaen

gwaenhi pyeon-anhaejyeo

chagaun nae an-e deul-eowa

neoui ttatteushan geu ongiga

Baby I’m falling for you

I love you our love is true

(an-ajwo) sigan-i jinado

I love you our love is true

(an-ajwo) byeonhaji mal-ajwo o o

I love you

Our love is true

(an-ajwo)
